about.name: The following questions are from real DMV written tests. These are some of the actual permit questions you will face in California. Each permit practice test question has three answer choices. Select one answer for each question and select "grade this section." You can find this button at the bottom of the drivers license quiz.  For a complete list of questions and answers for California please visit https://cheat-sheets.dmv-written-test.com/en/california/car.

hasPart.name: In traffic moving at 50 to 55 mph, you are least likely to have an accident if you:

about.name: In traffic moving at 50 to 55 mph, you are least likely to have an accident if you:

hasPart.assesses: In traffic moving at 50 to 55 mph, you are least likely to have an accident if you: | In traffic moving at 50 to 55 mph, you are least likely to have an accident if you: -  Real 2025 DMV Questions
hasPart.text: You should adjust your speed to travel smoothly with the other traffic on a roadway (provided that the other traffic is driving within the posted speed limits). Remember that vehicles moving in the same direction at the same speed cannot hit each other. Crashes involving multiple vehicles often happen when some vehicles are traveling at different speeds than others.

suggestedAnswer.text: Drive a few miles per hour faster than most other vehicles.

comment.text: Drive a few miles per hour faster than most other vehicles.
Stay within that speed range.

suggestedAnswer.text: Drive a few miles per hour slower than most other vehicles.

comment.text: Drive a few miles per hour slower than most other vehicles.
Stay within that speed range.

answerExplanation.text: You should adjust your speed to travel smoothly with the other traffic on a roadway (provided that the other traffic is driving within the posted speed limits). Remember that vehicles moving in the same direction at the same speed cannot hit each other. Crashes involving multiple vehicles often happen when some vehicles are traveling at different speeds than others.

comment.text: In traffic moving at 50 to 55 mph, you are least likely to have an accident if you: | You should adjust your speed to travel smoothly with the other traffic on a roadway (provided that the other traffic is driving within the posted speed limits). Remember that vehicles moving in the same direction at the same speed cannot hit each other. Crashes involving multiple vehicles often happen when some vehicles are traveling at different speeds than others.

hasPart.name: What is the only effective way to remove alcohol from the body?

about.name: What is the only effective way to remove alcohol from the body?

hasPart.assesses: What is the only effective way to remove alcohol from the body? | What is the only effective way to remove alcohol from the body? -  Real 2025 DMV Questions
hasPart.text: The only way to remove the effects of alcohol from the body is to let time pass. Eating, drinking coffee, or taking a shower will not speed up this process.

comment.text: Drink strong coffee.
Wait.
Take a cold shower.
Wait.

answerExplanation.text: The only way to remove the effects of alcohol from the body is to let time pass. Eating, drinking coffee, or taking a shower will not speed up this process.

comment.text: What is the only effective way to remove alcohol from the body? | The only way to remove the effects of alcohol from the body is to let time pass. Eating, drinking coffee, or taking a shower will not speed up this process.

hasPart.name: "No passing zone" signs tell drivers:
hasPart.assesses: "No passing zone" signs tell drivers: | "No passing zone" signs tell drivers: -  Real 2025 DMV Questions
hasPart.text: If you come across a "No passing zone" sign, it is not legal to pass in the indicated area. You are likely driving in an area with restricted visibility where it would be unsafe to pass another vehicle.

comment.text: To speed up slightly.

suggestedAnswer.text: That it is not safe to pass.

comment.text: That it is not safe to pass.
To maintain a steady speed.

acceptedAnswer.text: That it is not safe to pass.

comment.text: That it is not safe to pass.

answerExplanation.text: If you come across a "No passing zone" sign, it is not legal to pass in the indicated area. You are likely driving in an area with restricted visibility where it would be unsafe to pass another vehicle.

hasPart.name: If a tire suddenly blows out while you are driving, you should:

about.name: If a tire suddenly blows out while you are driving, you should:

hasPart.assesses: If a tire suddenly blows out while you are driving, you should: | If a tire suddenly blows out while you are driving, you should: -  Real 2025 DMV Questions
hasPart.text: If you experience a sudden tire blowout, do not panic. Grasp the steering wheel firmly and take your foot off the accelerator to allow the vehicle to roll to a stop. Lightly apply the breaks when it is safe to do so. Do not move to the shoulder of the road until the car has slowed considerably.

suggestedAnswer.text: Grip the steering wheel firmly, slow down, and exit the traffic lane.

comment.text: Grip the steering wheel firmly, slow down, and exit the traffic lane.
Pump the brakes rapidly.

suggestedAnswer.text: Brake hard and steer toward the right edge of the roadway.

comment.text: Brake hard and steer toward the right edge of the roadway.

acceptedAnswer.text: Grip the steering wheel firmly, slow down, and exit the traffic lane.

comment.text: Grip the steering wheel firmly, slow down, and exit the traffic lane.

answerExplanation.text: If you experience a sudden tire blowout, do not panic. Grasp the steering wheel firmly and take your foot off the accelerator to allow the vehicle to roll to a stop. Lightly apply the breaks when it is safe to do so. Do not move to the shoulder of the road until the car has slowed considerably.

comment.text: If a tire suddenly blows out while you are driving, you should: | If you experience a sudden tire blowout, do not panic. Grasp the steering wheel firmly and take your foot off the accelerator to allow the vehicle to roll to a stop. Lightly apply the breaks when it is safe to do so. Do not move to the shoulder of the road until the car has slowed considerably.

hasPart.text: To drive quickly, pass, or turn left, use the left lane. Use the right lane when driving more slowly than surrounding traffic, entering the road, or turning right.

suggestedAnswer.text: Stay in your lane so you don't impede the flow of traffic.

comment.text: Stay in your lane so you don't impede the flow of traffic.

suggestedAnswer.text: Drive onto the left shoulder to let the other vehicles pass.

comment.text: Drive onto the left shoulder to let the other vehicles pass.

suggestedAnswer.text: Move into the right lane when it is safe.

comment.text: Move into the right lane when it is safe.

acceptedAnswer.text: Move into the right lane when it is safe.

comment.text: Move into the right lane when it is safe.

answerExplanation.text: To drive quickly, pass, or turn left, use the left lane. Use the right lane when driving more slowly than surrounding traffic, entering the road, or turning right.

hasPart.name: Driving under the influence of any medication which impairs your driving is permitted:

about.name: Driving under the influence of any medication which impairs your driving is permitted:

hasPart.assesses: Driving under the influence of any medication which impairs your driving is permitted: | Driving under the influence of any medication which impairs your driving is permitted: -  Real 2025 DMV Questions
hasPart.text: It is illegal to drive under the influence of any substance that impairs your ability to drive safely. This includes alcohol, prescription medications, over-the-counter medications, and illegal drugs.

comment.text: Under no circumstances.
If you don't feel drowsy.

suggestedAnswer.text: If it is prescribed by a physician.

comment.text: If it is prescribed by a physician.
Under no circumstances.

answerExplanation.text: It is illegal to drive under the influence of any substance that impairs your ability to drive safely. This includes alcohol, prescription medications, over-the-counter medications, and illegal drugs.
